detectors.description:
IndexToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IndexToken.sol#262-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IndexToken.sol#265)

detectors.description:

detectors.description: Constant IndexToken.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IndexToken.sol#15) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

	- totalSupply = 10000000e18 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IndexToken.sol#15)
